News.headline: Tickets: Macclesfield Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Macclesfield Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Macclesfield Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to Moss Rose on Saturday 8th April, 3:00pm KO
News.description:
Away fans will be based in The Moss Lane Stand Visitors section which is a seated area (capacity 400) and The John Askey Terrace - uncovered (capacity 1500).

Please note that tickets will not be sold by the club in advance but tickets can be ordered in advance by calling Macclesfield on 01625 264 686. 

All student supporters will be asked to provide proof of “student” status at the ticket office when purchasing their ticket.

Ticket Prices:
                                                        Pre Match                                    Matchday
                                                        Seating                Terrace            Seating             Terrace
Adults                                               £17                      £13                 £19                   £15
Concessions, Seniors (65+),               £13                      £9                   £15                   £10
Juniors Under 18 / Students                £4                       £4                    £5                    £5
Juniors Under 12                                £2                       £2                    £3                    £3

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Our wheelchair user facilities are in the away section of the Moss Lane stand. We charge the full price for both ambulant disabled supporters and for wheelchair users. Where disabled supporters require assistance, their helpers will be admitted free of charge. Disabled tickets must be booked at least 24 hours in advance of kick-off.
